0: Clear separation of AI provider implementations through abstraction layer (src/ai/providers/) enabling multi-provider support without tight coupling
1: Strong domain service layer emergence (domain/services, domain/handlers, domain/prompts) showing architectural evolution toward better separation of concerns
2: Comprehensive persistent caching strategy with .shadow directory structure supporting the product's core requirement for expensive AI operation reuse
3: Robust error handling infrastructure (utils/errorHandler.ts) providing centralized error management across the extension
4: Well-structured webview abstraction (ui/webview/) enabling consistent HTML-based UI without duplicating rendering logic
5: Incremental analysis service architecture supporting iterative context gathering needed for large codebase analysis within token limits
